page.title: 04Home Life
page.content: Home Life (continued) scratch teflon material. Washing machines now wash and dry with efficiency .Our breakfast is of cereals, fruit juices or eggs and bacon, marmalade and toast. We drink tea or coffee. many meals are made from fast-frozen convenience packs,saving time and trouble. The children like to eat hamburgers, fish fingers, baked beans,sausages,pizzas and fish and chips. Adults are now becoming aware of healthy eating. Wholemeal and stone-ground bread take preference to white. Many fats and sugar substances are being discarded in favour of natural foods. Salt intake has been cut to a minimum owing to the high magnesium content. Our pleasures include stereo music centres, radio,television with video. Our pets include dogs,cats,rabbits,
